title: Issue 47 Scenario 1 Expected Behavior
content:
SCENARIO 1: Basic Quick Tab Creation and Cross-Tab State Persistence

EXPECTED BEHAVIOR:
- Quick Tabs persist position and size across tabs
- Changes in one tab are reflected in all other tabs
- Quick Tab created in one tab appears automatically in newly opened tabs
- Quick Tab maintains same ID across all tabs
- State synchronization happens via BroadcastChannel and browser.storage

TEST IMPLEMENTATION:
- Create Quick Tab on page 1
- Open page 2 in new tab within same context
- Verify Quick Tab appears on page 2 with same ID and URL
- Uses waitForQuickTabCount for synchronization polling

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Cross-tab state must be immediate (within 1-2 seconds)
- Quick Tab ID must remain consistent
- No data loss during synchronization
